channel.title: Posts on A Femboy Bee
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Femboy Bee

item.title: The Bee Acquires a Drawing Tablet
item.description: A week ago, I got a new drawing tablet! It’s a ugee Q6, meant for mobile phones, but im using it for my laptop instead. For some reason the drawing area isn’t working properly for my phone, but thats fine, because it works nicely on my laptop! I felt like being able to draw freely as soon as I got the drawing tablet… Also finally having the opportunity to escape ibisPaint and learn on using Krita!! Can’t wait to start making new drawings with it… I did already doodle with it a lot!

item.title: Procrastination Sucks
item.description: Screw you procrastination! God, you really held me back for so long on making my website- ahem. Anyways! Yayyy I finally have my own website >w<!! Getting off straw.page now as im able to get more customizations and stuff! Though this isn’t the most for now, im tired lol. The straw.page may be taken down at some point but im lazy to update it right now. The stuff I host is also in here so yeye! Thanks to Linerly for motivating me enough to finally make my own website! This stuff is powered by Hugo btw, a static site generator.
